p.d: As he is looking for Anthony Pasquali's mobile phone, Vincent surprises Alice, who has no other choice but to tell him about the video showing Anthony with her sister. Claire meets Fabio, who she accuses of not respecting the agreement they made after Simon's death. She also blames him for having sent Anthony to her, who had been blackmailing her for several months. Just as the latter clearly becomes the prime suspect, his body is discovered: he had been hit and thrown into the water on the day of the wedding. At the same time, Claire learns that she is seriously ill: her frequent tremors are caused by Lou Gehrig's disease... Directed by: Marwen Abdallah (France, 2018) Screenplay: Jeanne Le Guillou, Bruno Dega Cast: Alexia Barlier (Alice), Cristiana Reali (Claire), Lannick Gautry (Vincent), Patrick Catalifo (Guy), Alexandra Vandernoot (Géraldine), Stéphane Freiss (Étienne), Constance Labbé (Camille), Guillaume Duhesme (William), David BaIot (Benjamin), Stefan Godin (Pierre), Sophie de La Rochefoucauld (Cathy), Selma Kouchy (Yasmina), Joyce Bibring (Sandra), Laurent Fernandez (Marc), Thomas Drelon (Fabio), Claire-Lise Lecerf (Blandine), Julien Faure (Fabien), François Sciolla (Anthony), Romain Paul (Simon) Genre: drama
